name: RTFKT X TAKASHI MURAKAMI X GEISAI EVENT

metadata.description:
The Clone X who consumes this pill will receive two (2) Takashi Murakami customized traits -- one (1) new Murakami designed background trait and one (1) Murakami customization of an existing Clone wearable or accessory trait. The Clone X holder must redeem the pill by December 31, 2023.

Digital Collectible terms and conditions apply, see https://rtfkt.com/legal-2D

Third Party Rights Owner Notice - Takashi Murakami/Kaikai Kiki Co., Ltd, see: https://rtfkt.com/legal-X1

If your Clone X Avatar that you redeem is registered for a commercial license, the commercial license will end.

Murakami Clone X Avatar terms will apply to the resulting Murakami Drip Trait Clone X Avatar â€“ see: https://rtfkt.com/legal-2B
